package.emmetSyntaxProfiles: Define profile for specified syntax or use your own profile with specific rules.
package.emmetExclude: An array of languages where Emmet abbreviations should not be expanded.
package.emmetVariables: Variables to be used in Emmet snippets
package.emmetPreferences: Preferences used to modify behavior of some actions and resolvers of Emmet.
package.emmetPreferencesCssAfter: Symbol to be placed at the end of CSS property when expanding CSS abbreviations
package.emmetPreferencesSassAfter: Symbol to be placed at the end of CSS property when expanding CSS abbreviations in Sass files
package.emmetPreferencesStylusAfter: Symbol to be placed at the end of CSS property when expanding CSS abbreviations in Stylus files
package.emmetPreferencesCssBetween: Symbol to be placed at the between CSS property and value when expanding CSS abbreviations
package.emmetPreferencesSassBetween: Symbol to be placed at the between CSS property and value when expanding CSS abbreviations in Sass files
package.emmetPreferencesStylusBetween: Symbol to be placed at the between CSS property and value when expanding CSS abbreviations in Stylus files
package.emmetPreferencesBemElementSeparator: Element separator used for classes when using the BEM filter
package.emmetPreferencesBemModifierSeparator: Modifier separator used for classes when using the BEM filter
package.emmetPreferencesFilterCommentBefore: A definition of comment that should be placed before matched element when comment filter is applied.
package.emmetPreferencesFilterCommentAfter: A definition of comment that should be placed after matched element when comment filter is applied.
package.emmetPreferencesFilterCommentTrigger: A comma-separated list of attribute names that should exist in abbreviation for the comment filter to be applied
package.emmetPreferencesFormatNoIndentTags: An array of tag names that should not get inner indentation
package.emmetPreferencesFormatForceIndentTags: An array of tag names that should always get inner indentation
package.emmetPreferencesCssWebkitProperties: Comma separated CSS properties that get the 'webkit' vendor prefix when used in Emmet abbreviation that starts with `-`. Set to empty string to always avoid the 'webkit' prefix.
package.emmetPreferencesCssMozProperties: Comma separated CSS properties that get the 'moz' vendor prefix when used in Emmet abbreviation that starts with `-`. Set to empty string to always avoid the 'moz' prefix.
package.emmetPreferencesCssOProperties: Comma separated CSS properties that get the 'o' vendor prefix when used in Emmet abbreviation that starts with `-`. Set to empty string to always avoid the 'o' prefix.
package.emmetPreferencesCssMsProperties: Comma separated CSS properties that get the 'ms' vendor prefix when used in Emmet abbreviation that starts with `-`. Set to empty string to always avoid the 'ms' prefix.
